scripts.production: npm run version:bump --silent && rm -f customer-support-sdk.min.js && npm run minifyJS --silent && npm run version:add --silent
scripts.version:add:
echo "/*! Ringover Customer Support SDK v$(npm run version:extract --silent) Build time: $(date '+%m-%d-%Y %H:%M:%S') */
$(cat customer-support-sdk.min.js)" > customer-support-sdk.min.js
scripts.version:extract: cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]'
